LEFT JOIN bill_info b on a.bill_id = b.id LEFT JOIN supplier_enterprise c on a.supplier_enterprise_id = c.id LEFT JOIN core_enterprise d on a.core_enterprise_id = d.id LEFT JOIN supplier_enterprise e on a.supplier_parent_id = e.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM transaction_contract a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.start_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_contract( id, num, amount, content, start_time, end_time, party_jia, party_yi, party_bing, core_enterprise_id, supplier_parent_id, supplier_enterprise_id, bill_id, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{num}, #{amount}, #{content}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{partyJia}, #{partyYi}, #{partyBing}, #{coreEnterpriseId.id}, #{supplierParentId.id}, #{supplierEnterpriseId.id}, #{billId.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE transaction_contract SET num = #{num}, amount = #{amount}, content = #{content}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, party_jia = #{partyJia}, party_yi = #{partyYi}, party_bing = #{partyBing}, core_enterprise_id = #{coreEnterpriseId.id}, supplier_parent_id = #{supplierParentId.id}, supplier_enterprise_id = #{supplierEnterpriseId.id}, bill_id = #{billId.id}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy.id}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
